Generation I.Red: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
Generation I.Yellow: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
Generation I.Stadium: If attacked, it stands up on its hind legs, bares its fangs and shrieks in an intimidating manner at its enemy.

Generation II.Gold: Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnawing on them.
Generation II.Silver: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down.
Generation II.Crystal: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnawing on them. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Raticate 's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
Generation III.Sapphire: Raticate 's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
Generation III.Emerald: A Raticate 's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
Generation III.FireRed: Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

Generation IV.Diamond: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
Generation IV.Pearl: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
Generation IV.Platinum: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnawing on them.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down.

Generation V.Black: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
Generation V.White: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
Generation V.Black 2: With its long fangs, this surprisingly violent Pokémon can gnaw away even thick concrete with ease.
Generation V.White 2: With its long fangs, this surprisingly violent Pokémon can gnaw away even thick concrete with ease.

Generation VI.X: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
Generation VI.Y: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.

Generation VII.Sun: It forms a group of Rattata, which it assumes command of. Each group has its own territory, and disputes over food happen often.
Generation VII.Moon: This gourmet Pokémon is particular about the taste and freshness of its food. Restaurants where Raticate live have a good reputation.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It has an incredibly greedy personality. Its nest is filled with so much food gathered by Rattata at its direction, it can't possibly eat it all.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It commands a nest of Rattata. Different nests don't get along, whipping up severe fights over feeding grounds.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: It makes its Rattata underlings gather food for it, dining solely on the most nutritious and delicious fare.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: It makes its Rattata underlings gather food for it, dining solely on the most nutritious and delicious fare.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It whittles down its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder block walls.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It whittles down its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder block walls.
